item.title: VLOG - Isolate your Hyper V Lab Environment from your network
item.description:
My first Vlog Post

This video, is the first, of what I hope to be many Vlog’s. I recently destroyed my old Lab set up, and I thought I would Vlog the steps I take to re-create it along with some useful information along the way when I start connecting my Lab up with Azure and Intune.

What is this video about?

This video explains how I isolate my ‘Lab’ network from my external network to avoid and DHCP and/or DNS crossover, providing a contained environment behind a single NAT address using Windows Server Routing and Remote Access.

Please provide any feedback, good, bad or indifferent to help me improve my delivery and bring you content that is meaningful.
